content: at the bottom wrap the cup around the nut and use the acorn nuts cast on tail to sew the side edges decrease and sew the ⇨ note the other acorn nuts are nut and cup decrease at the bottom hide all yarn tails knit in dark yellow and grass green inside the acorn nut instead of mid green make 1 per acorn cast on 8 sts using 3 25mm blackbird single pointed needles and mid green yarn start at the bottom row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row blackbird body in st st make 1 per bird cast on 10 row 3 k1 kfb 6 times k1 14 sts sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and black yarn row 4 to 8 starting on a ws purl row work 5 start at the bottom row in st st row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row row 9 k1 k2tog k2 3 times k1 11 sts in st st row 10 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 2 row 3 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row in st st row 4 to 18 starting on a ws purl row work 15 row 12 p2tog 5 times p1 6 sts row in st st pull through to cast off row 19 k1 kfb k1 8 times k1 26 sts row 20 to 28 starting on a ws purl row work 9 acorn cups row in st st and on row 24 mark the 13th stitch for ⇨ note the other acorn cups are knit in the beak position chocolate brown and gingerbread brown instead row 29 k1 k2tog k1 8 times k1 18 sts of woody brown row 30 purl make 1 per acorn cast on 18 sts using 3 25mm row 31 k2tog 9 times 9 sts single pointed needles and woody brown yarn start at the top edge pull through to cast off row 1 to 6 knit row 7 k2tog k1 6 times 12 sts blackbird beak row 8 knit make 1 per bird cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and dark yellow yarn row 9 k2tog 6 times 6 sts cast off all sts pull through to cast off autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 5 of 19 blackbird tail branch make 1 per bird cast on 6 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and black yarn start at the branch side edge make 1 cast on 15 sts using 3 25mm single row 1 to 6 knit pointed needles and woody brown yarn cast off all sts row 1 rs k1 p1 k1 to end row 2 ws p1 k1 p1 to end blackbird wings row 3 to 64 repeat row 1 to 2 thirty-one more make 2 per bird cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm times single pointed needles and black yarn start at the cast off
